channel.title: [showoff] what every AQ fan wanted me to convert - Blade of Awe [v1.5] added
channel.description:
well guess what... you guys tempted me... and it took 4 hours... but here it is
BLADE OF AWE with glow: [IMG]http://up2share.com/file/6h89jh5dw_Blade%20of%20awe%20wg.bmp[/img]
Blade of awe without glow: [IMG]http://up2share.com/file/x9i0d1fd3_without%20glow.bmp[/img]
blade of awe with char with glow: [IMG]http://up2share.com/file/08iud8mq9_charwg.bmp[/img]
Blade of awe with char without glow: [IMG]http://up2share.com/file/70c7dmmxi_cwog.bmp[/img]
whatcha think... i am trying to fix the glow... cuz i think it dosent... fit it right
so v2 will ahve fixed glow[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 11:33:32 pm[/size][hr][img]http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w262/Beeferoniz/a1-4.jpg[/img]
errr fixed glow v1.5
[IMG]http://up2share.com/file/0nmbcge5h_blade%20of%20awe%20v2.bmp[/img]
forgot glow dosent go in sharpness... goes roundish
